resources.string: Wannan zai bude sanarwar sakwannin Bharat Plus dinka/ki dindindin
Daga amfana da kira da sakwannin Bharat Plus
Hana kira da sakwanni daga Bharat Plus
Don kkashe sakwanni da kiran Bharat Plus ta hanyar fita daga rijistar Bharat Plus a saba Ka/kina bukata ka/ki kara rijistar lambar wayar domin samun damar yin amfani dasu nan gaba.
Taba domin canza tanadadden aikace-aikacen sakwanninka
Taba domin mayar da Signal tanadadden aikace-aikacen sakwanninka/ki

Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin ajiya domin samun damar hada hotuna, bidiyoyi ko kuma odiyo,amma kuma an hana izinin dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga menun wurin saiti, zabi \"permissions\", kuma ka/ki shiga \"storage\" ka/ki bada dama.

Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin lambobin sadarwarka/ki domin asamu damar hada bayanansu amma sai dai anhana wannan damar dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga cikin mazabar saitin aikace-aikacen Bharat Plus ka/ki zabi \"Permissions\" sannan ka/ki bada damar \"Contacts\".

Bharat Plus na bukatan bada izinin wurin da ake domin asamu a hada wuri amma an hana wannan damar dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga mazabar saitin aikace-aikacen sannan ka/ki zabi \"permissins\", sai kuma ka/ki bada damar \"location\".
Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin kyamara domin daukar hotuna amma anhana wannan damar dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga mazabar saitin aikace-aikacen Bharat Plus ka/ki da damar \"Kyamara\".
Membobin rukuni suna da damar dawowa da kai/ke rukunin.
Zaku samu damar aikawa juna sakonni da kiran juna.

Ankasa turawa, taba domin mazaba mara tsaro.
Wannan sako ba zai samu tsaro ba sabida mai karba ya daina amfani da Signal.\n\nTura sako mara tsaro?
Babu aikace-aikace mai bude wannan midiyan.
Kara saitin mahajin bayanai masu tsaro?
Wannan zai iya taimakawa idan akasamu matsala da tsaro a wannan hiran. Ba zaka/ki rasa sakwanninka ba.

Mai karban wannan sakon bashida lambar ko imel na kwarai.

Zaka iya samun sako ko kira daga wannan lambar.
Membobi da suke da lambarka zasu iya dawowa da kai cikin rukunin nan.
Makalawa da aka sa yayiwa irin wannan sakon nauyi.
An rasa app da zai iya daukan wannan hadin a na\'urarka/ki.
Domin aika sakon odiyo, bari Bharat Plus ya samu damar aiki da reno.
Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin reno domin aikar da sakwanin odiyo amma an hana wannnan damar dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga mazabar saitin aikace-aikacen signal ka/ki ba da damar \"Microphone\".
Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin Reno da Kyamara domin kiran %s, amma anhana wannan dama dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga saitin affilikashon, zabi \"Permissions\", sannan kunna \"Reno\" da \"Kyamara\".
Domin kama hotuna ko bidiyo, ka/ki bawa Bharat Plus dama.

Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin Kyamara domin daukan hotuna ko bidiyo amma an hana wannan damar dindindin. Cigaba ka/ki shiga cikin mazabar saitin Bharat Plus ka/ki zabi \"Permission\" domin ka/ki bawa \"Camera\" dama.

Bawa reno damar daukan bidiyo da sauti.

Saita lokacin yin tsit dashi zuwa shekara 1
Yi amfani da signal wajen karbar sako masu shigowa
Yi amfani da Signal domin sakonnin hoto, waka, da bidiyo masu shigowa
Idan ka/kika danna Enter key, sakonnika/ki zasu turu
Za\'a iya dubawa da Imgur, Instagram, Pinterest, Reddit, da kuma mahadin Youtube.
Zabi lambar sadarwarka/ki daga cikin jerin lambobim sadrwar.
Karfafa kullewar kalaman sirri a fuskar na\'ura
Kulle fuskar na\'ura da sanarwa da kalmomin sirri
Toshe sikirinshot da suke cikin jerin yanzu da kuma cikin manhaja
Sarrafa Signal ya kulle kansa bayan \'yan lokutan rashin aiki.
Lokacin kashe kalmomin sirri domin rashin aiki yayi
Lokaci tsakanin rashin aiki da kurewa
Agent din mai amfani da MMS
Tambayi sakamakon ko wanne sakon SMS da ka/kika tura.
Sarrafa gogewar tsofaffin sakonni da kansu da zarar yafi tsawon da aka tsara
Binciki ko wace hira kuma tabbatar da adadin tsawon su
Kira da sakonni kyauta da sirri zuwa masu amfani da Signal
Karfafa idan na\'urarka/ki na amfani da sakion SMS/MMS bisa WiFi (karfafawa dole sai an karfafa \'kiran WiFi\' a na\'urarka/ki)
Idan aka kashe shaidar karatun sakonni, bazaka/ki samu damar ganin shaidar karatun wasu ba idan suma sun karanta sakon da aka aika.
Idan aka kashe manunin rubutu, bazaka/ki samu damar ganin manunin rubutu daga wasu ba.
Sa allon harrufa nakashewar koyo da kai
Sanda ake amfani da datar waya
Sanda ake zama cikin hanyar internet a bayan fage
Saukar da midiya mai sarrafa kanta
Amsa duk kira ta sabar Signal domin kauce bayyana adireshin IP din lambobin sadarwarka/ki. Karfafawa zai rage inagancin kira.
A juya kira ko da yaushe
Nuna jiran shigar gayyata domin abokanen sadarwa da basu da Bharat Plus
Nuna alamar matsayi sanda ka/kika zabi bayanan sako a cikin sakonni da aka isar da rufaffen mai turawa.
Karfafa rufaffen mai aika sako don sakonni masu shigowa daga waddanda basu cikin lambobin sadawarka/ki da kuma mutane da baka/ki tura ma sako ba.
Fitar da zababbe daga wajen da aka adana
Zip. Zilch. Zero. Nada.\nAn kama ku!
Maida akwatin sakonka/ki abun yabawa. Fara ta hanyar turawa abokai sako.

plurals.name: reminder_header_outdated_build_details
plurals.item: Sigar Signal dinka/ki zai zo karshen aiki cikin kwana %d. Taba domin sabuntawa zuwa sabon sigar.
Saura kwana %d wannan sigar Signal din zata daina aiki a naurarka/ki. Taba do saukar da sabuwar ingantacciyar manhajar Signal..

resources.string: Yau ne ranar wa\'adin sigar Signal dinka/ki. Taba domin sabunta zuwa mafi sabon siga.
Sigar Signal dinka/ki ya zo karshen aiki!
Za\'a daina samun nasarar aikar da sakonni. Taba domin sabunta zuwa mafi sabon sigar.
Yi amfani dashi a matsayin tanadadden manhajar SMS
Taba domin mayar da Signal tanadadden manhajarka/ki wajen tura sakonin SMS dinka/ki.
Taba domin kwafa SMS din wayarka/ki zuwa shiryayyen bayanin Signal mai tsaro.
Signal yafi dadi idan abokai da yawa suna amfani dashi.
Signal na fuskantar wasu matsaloli. Muna iya kokarinmu domin dawowa da sabis da wur-wuri.
Sabbobin fasalin Signal bazasu yi aiki akan wannan sigar Android ba. Sabunta wannan na\'urar domin samun duk wani sabuntarwar Signal na gaba.
An samu nasarar goge tsofaffin sakonni
Jakar tsare-tsaren manhajar Signal ya kare kansa %1$d%% daga cikin sakonninka/ki masu fita cikin kwanaki %2$d da suka wuce. Hira tsakannin masu amfani da Signal na da tsari.
Ana lissafin sashin bayanainka/ki da sakonni da suke futa waddanda basu bace ba kuma ba\'a goge ba cikin kwanaki %1$d da suka wuce.
Fara ma\'amala mai tsari kuma karfafa sabobbin fasali da suka fi karfin sakonnin SMS mara tsari ta hanyar gayyatar karin lambobin sadarwa domin su shiga Signal.
An samu waddannan tarin bayanai ne daga asalin na\'urarka/ki kuma kai/ke kadai zaka/ki iya ganinsu. Babu inda ake turasu.
Duba sakonninka da suke futa nawa ne aka tura da tsari, sannan ka/ki gaggauta ka/ki gayyaci sabbobin lambobin sadarwa domin ka/ki darajar Signal dinka/ki.
Zaka/ki iya kara lambar sakonninka/ki masu tsari zuwa %1$d%%
Kirkiri lambobin sirri a hade da haruffa.
Zaka/ki iya canza lambobin sirrinka/ki idan da rijista akan wannan na\'ura.

Ka/ki tsare bayanai da ka/kika ajiye da Signal domin ya Zaman to kai/ke kadai ne/ceke damar isonshi. Furofayil, saiti, da lambobin sadarwarka/ki za su dawo saitin ainihi idan ka/kika sake girka Signal.
An samu kuskuren lambobin sirri. Kara gwadawa.
Ba\'a ajiye lambobin sirrinka/ki ba. Zamu baka/ki damar kirkiram wasu lambobin sirri, anjima.

Ka/ki tsare bayanai da ka/kika ajiye da Signal domin ya Zaman to kai/ke kadai ne/ceke damar isonshi. Furofayil, saiti, da lambobin sadarwarka/ki za su dawo saitin ainihi idan ka/kika sake girka Signal.
Karanta karin bayanin akan ambobin sirri.
Shigar da lambobin sirrin Signal dinka/ki
Domin tayaka/ki haddace lambobin sirrinka/ki, zamu rinka tambayan lambobin lokaci-lokaci. Zamu rage tambaya nan gaba.
Lambobin sirrinnan ba dai dai bane. Kara gwadawa.
Sa lambobin sirri da ka/kika kirkirarwa asusunka/ki. Waddannan lambobin, daban suke da waddanda aka turo maka/ki ta SMS.
Shigar da lambobin sirri mai haruffa.
Shigar da lambobin sirri mai lambobi zalla
Lambobin sirrinnan ba dai dai bane. Kara gwadawa.
Za\'a nuna wannan idan ka/kika fara wani hira ko kuma idan ka/kika tura hira.
Bayanan furofayil dinka/ki zasu iya hada da karin suna idan ka/kina so.
Signal na bukatar izinin SMS domin aikawa da SMS, amma an hana wannan damar dindindin. Dan karasa zuwa mazabar saiti manhajar, zabi Izini sannan karfafe SMS.

Signal na bukatar izinin Lambobin sadarwa domin binciken lambobin sadarwarka/ki, amma anhana wannan damar. Ci gaba da shigar mazabar saitin afilikashon dinnan, zabi \"Izini\" sai kuma a karfafa \"Lambobin sadarwa\".
Za\'a ajiye tsimi a ajiyar waje kuma za\'a tsaresu da kalmomin sirri da suke kasa. Dole sai ka/kinada kalmomin sirri zaka/ki samu damar yin tsimi ko kuma maida na\'ura tsarin asali.
Na rike wannan kalmomin sirri. In ba tare dashi ba, bazan iya yin tsimi ko kuma maida tsarin asali.
Ajiye tsimin hira a ajiyar waje
Shigar da kalmomin sirri na tsimi
Baza\'a iya shigar da tsimi daga sababbin sigar Signal ba.
Kalmomin sirrin tsiminnan ba daidai bane
Dawo da sakonninka/ki da midiya daga takaitaccen tsimi. Idan baka/ki dawo dasu yanzu ba, ba zaka/ki iya dawowa dasu anjima ba.
Tabbatar da ganewarka/ki ta hanyar shaidawa a akwatin tabbata.
Nakashe kuma goge duk nakaitaccen tsimi?
Bharat Plus na bukatar izinin ajiyar waje domin kirkirar tsimi, amma an hana wannan dama dindindin. Dan ci gaba da shigar mazabar saitin manhajar, zabi Izini sannan karfafa Ajiya.
Shigar da lambar sirrin da aka aiko maka/ki%s.
Rijistar Signal - Lambar tabbatar sirri na Android
Kulle hanyar hadin Signal da mukullin fuskar Android da kuma sawun yatsa.
Lokacin aikin kullin fuskar na\'ura ya kure

Ka/ki tsare bayanai da ka/kika ajiye da Signal domin ya Zaman to kai/ke kadai ne/ceke damar isonshi. Furofayil, saiti, da lambobin sadarwarka/ki za su dawo saitin ainihi idan ka/kika sake girka Signal.
Tabbatar. I lambobin sirrin Signal dinka/ki.
Lambobin sirrinnan ba dai dai bane. Kara gwadawa.
Lambar sirrin rijista ba daya bane da lambar sirrin tabbatarwar SMS da ka/kika samu. Dan shigar da lambar sirrin that ka/kika fara sakawa a manhajar.
Akwai lambobi guda hudu a cikin lambobin sirrin. Idan ka/kika manta da lambobin sirrinka/ki za\'a iya kulle asusunka/ki har tsawon kwana bakwai.
Karfafa lambar sirrin Rijista da za\'a bukacesu wajen sake rijistar Signal da wannan lambar.
Dole sai ka/kin shigar da lambar sirrin rijistarka/ki
Wannan mukullin lambobin sirrin rijista ba daidai bane.
Ka/kinyi gwaje-gwajen lambar sirrin Rijista da yawa waddanda duk ba daidai bane. Kara gwadawa bayan kwana daya.
Zaka/ki iya rijistar wannan lambar waya ba tareda ka sa lambar sirrin rijista ba bayan kwana 7 da karshen yin amfani da Signal. Ka/ki na da raguwar kwana %d.
Wannan lambar waya nada mukullin Rijista a karfafe. Dan shigar da lambobin sirrin Rijista.
Mukullin Rijista a karfafe yake a lambar wayarka/ki. Domin tunawa da lambobin sirrin Rijistarka/ki, Signal zai diga tambayar tabbatarwarka/ki.
Mukullin rijista na taimakawa wajen kare lambar wayarka/ki daga gwajin rijista da ba\'a yarda dashi ba. Za\'a iya nakashe wannan fasalin ko da yaushe a cikin saitin sirri na Signal dinka/ki.
Dole sai lambobin sirrin rijista sun kai wa\'adi %d .
Lambobin sirri da ka/kika shigar basu dace ba
